CHAPTER XI--OFFERS OF SERVICE FROM MISERY TO WRETCHEDNESS MARIUS ASCENDED THE STAIRS OF THE HOVEL WITH SLOW STEPS
AND FOR SEVENTEEN YEARS HE MAJESTICALLY PRESERVED THE SADNESS OF WATERLOO PAYING HARDLY ANY ATTENTION TO INTERVENING EVENTS
HE DID NOT ATTEMPT TO IMPART TO HIS CHASUBLE THE FOLDS OF ELIJAH'S MANTLE
HIS PROFILE ALL OF WHOSE LINES WERE ROUNDED WITHOUT THEREBY LOSING THEIR FIRMNESS HAD A CERTAIN GERMANIC SWEETNESS WHICH HAS MADE ITS WAY INTO THE FRENCH PHYSIOGNOMY BY WAY OF ALSACE AND LORRAINE AND THAT COMPLETE ABSENCE OF ANGLES WHICH RENDERED THE SICAMBRES SO EASILY RECOGNIZABLE AMONG THE ROMANS AND WHICH DISTINGUISHES THE LEONINE FROM THE AQUILINE RACE

A SERGEANT OF THE ENGLISH GUARDS THE FOREMOST BOXER IN ENGLAND REPUTED INVULNERABLE BY HIS COMPANIONS HAD BEEN KILLED THERE BY A LITTLE FRENCH DRUMMER-BOY
THIS CHILD NEVER FELT SO WELL AS WHEN HE WAS IN THE STREET
THENARDIER NOTED THE ENORMOUS SIZE OF THE CUDGEL AND THE SOLITUDE OF THE SPOT
THEY ARE PALE AND GRAVE
HAVE YOU SLID LAUGHING DOWN A SLOPE ALL WET WITH RAIN WITH A BELOVED WOMAN HOLDING YOUR HAND AND CRYING AH MY NEW BOOTS
SHE IS CHARMING SHE IS DISCREET IT IS NOT TRUE ABOUT THE LANCER SHE HAS MADE HEAPS OF LINT SHE'S A JEWEL SHE ADORES YOU IF YOU HAD DIED THERE WOULD HAVE BEEN THREE OF US HER COFFIN WOULD HAVE ACCOMPANIED MINE
HE EXCLAIMED WITH A VIVACITY WHICH HAD SOMETHING OF WRATH IN IT
THIS CREATED ENIGMAS WHICH EXERCISED THE IMAGINATIONS OF THE BIG GIRLS SUCH AS

WATCHFULNESS AND SUPERVISION

CARTOUCHE'S TALK WOULD HAVE BEEN HEBREW TO LACENAIRE
IT IS PAVED THROUGHOUT A NOTABLE PORTION OF ITS EXTENT
BAMATABOIS
WHEN IT REACHES THE HEART I SHALL STOP

THE PRUSSIAN CAVALRY NEWLY ARRIVED DASHES FORWARDS FLIES HEWS SLASHES KILLS EXTERMINATES

CHAPTER II--ANCIENT HISTORY OF THE SEWER LET THE READER IMAGINE PARIS LIFTED OFF LIKE A COVER THE SUBTERRANEAN NET-WORK OF SEWERS FROM A BIRD'S EYE VIEW WILL OUTLINE ON THE BANKS A SPECIES OF LARGE BRANCH GRAFTED ON THE RIVER

THAT WEARS A MAN OUT QUICKLY

AU BON COING
WHO KNOWS WHETHER JEAN VALJEAN HAD NOT BEEN ON THE EVE OF GROWING DISCOURAGED AND OF FALLING ONCE MORE

IT IS I WHO ASK YOUR FORGIVENESS AND ON MY KNEES

IT WAS SOMBRE MYSTERIOUS AND IMMENSE
SHE WORE A DRESS OF BLACK DAMASK A CAPE OF THE SAME MATERIAL AND A BONNET OF WHITE CRAPE
CERTAIN SUCCESS WOULD ATTEND THE EXPERIMENT OF EMPLOYING THE CITY TO MANURE THE PLAIN
THEY LABORED AT THE STAGE SETTING
FROM EXTREME COLDNESS HE HAD PASSED BY DEGREES TO EXTREME EMOTION
THE HAIR WAS THE SAME ALSO THE PROFILE SO FAR AS THE CAP PERMITTED A VIEW OF IT THE MIEN IDENTICAL ONLY MORE DEPRESSED
THE FIRST PART IS A GARDEN THE SECOND IS AN ORCHARD THE THIRD IS A WOOD
AND AFTER ALL I DON'T KNOW WHAT IS WANTED OF ME THE MAN CEASED SPEAKING AND REMAINED STANDING
THOU KNOWEST IT AND SHE HID HER BLUSHING FACE ON THE BREAST OF THE SUPERB AND INTOXICATED YOUNG MAN
THESE CONSISTED OF LARGE SLABS OF BLUE STONE WHICH FORM A HEAP AMONG THE NETTLES
HIS LITTLE NARROW CHEST PANTED LIKE A FORGE BELLOWS
THESE ROPES WERE DISTINCTLY VISIBLE LIKE HAIRS AGAINST THE SKY
INSURRECTION WHICH IS SPEEDILY EXHAUSTED HAS ONLY A CERTAIN NUMBER OF SHOTS TO FIRE AND A CERTAIN NUMBER OF COMBATANTS TO EXPEND

THERE WAS STILL FIRE ENOUGH TO ALLOW OF THEIR BEING PUT OUT OF SHAPE AND CONVERTED INTO A SORT OF UNRECOGNIZABLE BAR OF METAL
NOT EVEN A BOATMAN NOR A LIGHTER-MAN WAS IN THE SKIFFS WHICH WERE MOORED HERE AND THERE
ALL THE YOUNG GIRLS WERE SINGING THE HERMIT OF SAINT-AVELLE WITH WORDS BY EDMOND GERAUD
I COULD NOT FIND WORDS FOR IT AT FIRST
THE PHILOSOPHERS TALK STUFF AND NONSENSE
BUT AT FIVE O'CLOCK PERCEIVING WELLINGTON'S PERIL BLUCHER ORDERED BULOW TO ATTACK AND UTTERED THESE REMARKABLE WORDS

HERE THE SUIT OF A MAGISTRATE THERE THE OUTFIT OF A CURE BEYOND THE OUTFIT OF A BANKER IN ONE CORNER THE COSTUME OF A RETIRED MILITARY MAN ELSEWHERE THE HABILIMENTS OF A MAN OF LETTERS AND FURTHER ON THE DRESS OF A STATESMAN
SO I SAY THAT HE MARCHED ON THE BENCH AS I SHOULD SAY

THE FRENCH REVOLUTION IS AN ACT OF GOD
THE CATACOMBS IN WHICH THE FIRST MASS WAS SAID WERE NOT ALONE THE CELLAR OF ROME THEY WERE THE VAULTS OF THE WORLD
HIS MOTHER HAD DIED OF A MILK FEVER WHICH HAD NOT BEEN PROPERLY ATTENDED TO

MOREOVER THERE WAS IN ALL THESE WORDS OF THENARDIER IN HIS ACCENT IN HIS GESTURE IN HIS GLANCE WHICH DARTED FLAMES AT EVERY WORD THERE WAS IN THIS EXPLOSION OF AN EVIL NATURE DISCLOSING EVERYTHING IN THAT MIXTURE OF BRAGGADOCIO AND ABJECTNESS OF PRIDE AND PETTINESS OF RAGE AND FOLLY IN THAT CHAOS OF REAL GRIEFS AND FALSE SENTIMENTS IN THAT IMMODESTY OF A MALICIOUS MAN TASTING THE VOLUPTUOUS DELIGHTS OF VIOLENCE IN THAT SHAMELESS NUDITY OF A REPULSIVE SOUL IN THAT CONFLAGRATION OF ALL SUFFERINGS COMBINED WITH ALL HATREDS SOMETHING WHICH WAS AS HIDEOUS AS EVIL AND AS HEART-RENDING AS THE TRUTH

HE HASTENED TO THE STAIRS
IT SEEMED TO HIM THAT HE HAD JUST CAUGHT SIGHT BY THE LIGHT OF THE STREET LANTERN NOT OF THE PLACID AND BEAMING VISAGE OF THE OLD BEADLE BUT OF A WELL-KNOWN AND STARTLING FACE
IT HAD NEITHER HINGES CROSS-BARS LOCK NOR FISSURE IN THE MIDDLE
THEY WERE ALONE IN THE GARDEN
SHE MURMURED NOT WHEN I MAY BE GOING AWAY AND YOU CANNOT COME HE WENT ON DO YOU LOVE ME SHE REPLIED SOBBING BY THAT WORD FROM PARADISE WHICH IS NEVER MORE CHARMING THAN AMID TEARS I ADORE YOU HE CONTINUED IN A TONE WHICH WAS AN INDESCRIBABLE CARESS DO NOT WEEP
THE OLD ONE WAS TWENTY-THREE
THAT OCCUPIES THEM
HE HELD IN HIS HAND SOMETHING WHICH RESEMBLED A LETTER
THIS CHILD OF THE PUDDLE IS ALSO THE CHILD OF THE IDEAL
SUCH IS THE THEORY OF THE SKILFUL
IT WAS ONLY SEVEN OR EIGHT MINUTES WALK FROM THE EDGE OF THE WOODS TO THE SPRING
EACH DAY HE SAW MORE DISTINCTLY
THE TOAD ALWAYS HAS HIS EYES FIXED ON HEAVEN
THEY SPOKE OF THE DUC DE REICHSTADT WHOM GOD HAD MARKED OUT FOR DEATH AT THAT VERY MOMENT WHEN THE POPULACE WERE DESIGNATING HIM FOR THE EMPIRE
HE REMAINED FOR A TIME THOUGHTFULLY IN THIS ATTITUDE WHICH WOULD HAVE BEEN SUGGESTIVE OF SOMETHING SINISTER FOR ANY ONE WHO HAD SEEN HIM THUS IN THE DARK THE ONLY PERSON AWAKE IN THAT HOUSE WHERE ALL WERE SLEEPING
I WON'T GO TO HIS FUNERAL THIS RESOLUTION ONCE ARRIVED AT BOSSUET JOLY AND GRANTAIRE DID NOT STIR FROM THE WINE-SHOP
CERTAIN WELL-KNOWN LEADERS WERE GOING THE ROUNDS THAT IS TO SAY RUNNING FROM ONE HOUSE TO ANOTHER TO COLLECT THEIR MEN
SHE WAS DRESSED LIKE A WORKING-WOMAN WHO IS INCLINED TO TURN INTO A PEASANT AGAIN
CAIUS GRACCHUS
BEING OF THE PAST HE BELONGED TO NIGHT
IT WAS NECESSARY TO SEND A DIVER TO EXPLORE THE FISSURE WHICH HAD BEEN MADE IN THE NARROW ENTRANCE OF THE GRAND BASIN AND IT WAS NOT WITHOUT GREAT DIFFICULTY THAT IT WAS STOPPED UP
YOU SEE MONSIEUR PONTMERCY VARIOUS THINGS HAVE HAPPENED TO ME IN THE COURSE OF MY LIFE AGAIN JEAN VALJEAN PAUSED SWALLOWING HIS SALIVA WITH AN EFFORT AS THOUGH HIS WORDS HAD A BITTER AFTER-TASTE AND THEN HE WENT ON
HE UTTERED A FRIGHTFUL CRY OF INWARD JOY
NAPOLEON WAS ONE OF THOSE GENIUSES FROM WHOM THUNDER DARTS
RATHER THE FAULT OF THE PRIVILEGED THAN THE FAULT OF THE DISINHERITED
MADELEINE WAS APPOINTED MAYOR
THAT THEY HAD FIRST DRIVEN TO THE RUE DES FILLES-DU-CALVAIRE
HER THOUGHT WAS CLEARLY PERCEPTIBLE BUT SHE UTTERED NO NAME SHE MADE NO COMPLAINT SHE BLAMED NO ONE
THESE THINGS ARE CHARMING WHEN ONE IS JOYOUS AND LUGUBRIOUS WHEN ONE IS SAD

HE LEANED HIS ELBOWS ON THE TABLE UNFOLDED THE PAPER AND READ
BUT AT THE SAME TIME CERTAIN FACTS ARISE COMPEL RECOGNITION AND KNOCK AT THE DOOR IN THEIR TURN
COSETTE LESS HAPPY THAN THE MOST INSIGNIFICANT SWALLOW OF HEAVEN HAD NEVER KNOWN WHAT IT WAS TO TAKE REFUGE UNDER A MOTHER'S SHADOW AND UNDER A WING
AN OMNIBUS WITH TWO WHITE HORSES PASSED THE END OF THE STREET
WAS IT BECAUSE OF COSETTE
HERE IT IS DEFORMED
SO THIS MADAME VICTURNIEN WENT TO MONTFERMEIL AND RETURNED WITH THE REMARK I HAVE SEEN THE CHILD ALL THIS TOOK TIME
THEY COULD SEE NOTHING REMARKABLE ABOUT IT EXCEPT TWO CANDLESTICKS OF ANTIQUE PATTERN WHICH STOOD ON THE CHIMNEY-PIECE AND APPEARED TO BE SILVER FOR THEY WERE HALL-MARKED AN OBSERVATION FULL OF THE TYPE OF WIT OF PETTY TOWNS
I CERTAINLY HAVE SEEN HIM SOMEWHERE
HERE'S THE LETTER
JEAN VALJEAN ON HIS SIDE EXPERIENCED A DEEP AND UNDEFINABLE OPPRESSION AT HEART
SHE FELT AN ANGUISH AT HER HEART WHICH NOTHING RELIEVED AND WHICH AUGMENTED EVERY DAY
THAT WHICH EMERGES FROM THE CEMETERY INTIMIDATES AND DISCONCERTS THAT WHICH EMERGES FROM THE CAVE
ON THE CORNER OF THE TABLE LAY AN ANCIENT DILAPIDATED REDDISH VOLUME AND THE SIZE WHICH WAS THE ANTIQUE 12MO OF READING-ROOMS BETRAYED A ROMANCE
AT THE EXPIRATION OF A FEW MINUTES THEY CAME RAGING BACK BUT IN VAIN THE THREE LITTLE FELLOWS WERE FAST ASLEEP AND HEARD NOTHING MORE
FORWARD HAVING BEEN EMBARKED WITH HIS COMPANY IN THE EXIGENCIES OF THE CAMPAIGN ON BOARD A PINNACE WHICH WAS PROCEEDING FROM GENOA TO SOME OBSCURE PORT ON THE COAST HE FELL INTO A WASPS'-NEST OF SEVEN OR EIGHT ENGLISH VESSELS
IT WAS A PERFECT FURNACE
I HAVE NEVER HAD THE HONOR OF BEING RECEIVED BY M
HE FLEW INTO A PASSION AT EVERYTHING GENERALLY QUITE CONTRARY TO ALL REASON
THEN BECOMING THOUGHTFUL HE MUTTERED BETWEEN HIS TEETH ALL THE SAME IF I HAD CHARGE OF THE BABES I'D LOCK EM UP BETTER THAN THAT JUST AS THEY WERE FINISHING THEIR MORSEL OF BREAD AND HAD REACHED THE ANGLE OF THAT GLOOMY RUE DES BALLETS AT THE OTHER END OF WHICH THE LOW AND THREATENING WICKET OF LA FORCE WAS VISIBLE HULLO IS THAT YOU GAVROCHE SAID SOME ONE
ONE OLD LADY A SUBSCRIBER TO THE DRAPEAU BLANC MADE THE FOLLOWING REMARK THE DEPTH OF WHICH IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO FATHOM I AM NOT SORRY
AND HE LAID HIS HEAD DOWN ON THE MAT AGAIN
6 IN THE OLD HOUSE WHICH HE OWNED
THE NEARER HE APPROACHED THE CORNER OF THE STREET THE MORE HIS EYE LIGHTED UP
COSETTE WAS FOR HER STILL THE LITTLE CHILD WHO IS CARRIED
HE DREAMED OF IT EVERY NIGHT
WAS IT THE EVIDENT PHYSICAL DECLINE OF NAPOLEON THAT COMPLICATED THIS EPOCH BY AN INWARD DIMINUTION OF FORCE
JEAN VALJEAN IMMEDIATELY PERCEIVED THAT THENARDIER DID NOT RECOGNIZE HIM
HE WAS A STRANGER IN THE DEPARTMENT
IT IS CLEAR THAT WE ARE MAKING FOR THE ABYSS
ANY ONE WHO HAS TRAVELLED KNOWS THAT THERE IS NO ONE WHO INDULGES IN BETTER CHEER THAN WAGONERS
HERE EVIDENTLY WAS A SOUL WHICH WAS INACCESSIBLE TO TERROR AND WHICH DID NOT KNOW THE MEANING OF DESPAIR
THOSE TWO WORDS HOWEVER HAD SET EVERY ONE IN THE CONVENT WHO HAD THE PRIVILEGE OF SPEECH TO CHATTERING
LONG LIVE THE REPUBLIC MARKED THE PASSAGE OF THE FUNERAL TRAIN
LIEUTENANTS ARE CROWNED KINGS
ON THE FOLLOWING DAY HE OBSERVED THAT THERE WAS NO FIRE ON THE HEARTH.--"HELLO HE THOUGHT
HE DREW FROM HIS SECRETARY A POCKET-BOOK WHICH CONTAINED SEVERAL BANK-NOTES AND THE PASSPORT OF WHICH HE HAD MADE USE THAT SAME YEAR WHEN HE WENT TO THE ELECTIONS
FOR HE HAD NEITHER HAVERSACK NOR BUNDLE
IT ENTERED THE RUE SAINT-HONORE BY THE TWO MOUTHS TO THE SEWER IN THE CHAMPS-ELYSEES THE RUE SAINT-FLORENTIN THROUGH THE SAINT-FLORENTIN SEWER THE RUE PIERRE-A-POISSON THROUGH THE SEWER DE LA SONNERIE THE RUE POPINCOURT THROUGH THE SEWER OF THE CHEMIN-VERT THE RUE DE LA ROQUETTE THROUGH THE SEWER OF THE RUE DE LAPPE
FOR AN AFFECTION IS A CONVICTION
ON LEAVING THE SISTER HE APPROACHED FANTINE
I RECEIVE AT THY FEET FANTINE ALONE REFUSED TO SWING
IN SHORT WHATEVER THIS JEAN VALJEAN MIGHT BE HE WAS UNDOUBTEDLY A CONSCIENCE WHICH WAS AWAKENING
HE SETTLED HIS CAP MORE FIRMLY ON HIS BROW SOUGHT MECHANICALLY TO CROSS AND BUTTON HIS BLOUSE ADVANCED A STEP AND STOPPED TO PICK UP HIS CUDGEL

ALL THIS HAD BEEN ACCOMPLISHED OUTSIDE THE BOUNDS OF ABSOLUTE RIGHT

I HAVE PROCURED MYSELF AN EDUCATION
THE ATTEMPT HAS BEEN MADE AND WRONGLY TO MAKE A CLASS OF THE BOURGEOISIE
HE HAD FERRETED OUT NOTHING
DE VOLTAIRE HAVE BEEN DYING ALL THEIR LIFE
THOLOMYES INTERVENED
I SHOULD HAVE BEEN SIDE BY SIDE WITH YOU IN YOUR EXISTENCE HAVING FOR MY ONLY CARE NOT TO DISARRANGE THE COVER OF MY DREADFUL PIT
THERE IS NOTHING UNUSUAL IN THE LATIN CHURCH IN THESE GRAFTS OF ONE ORDER ON ANOTHER
AND THIS TIME HE DID NOT RETURN
50 WHICH WAS THE FORTRESS OF JEANNE AND HER SIX HUNDRED COMPANIONS AND WHICH FLANKED ON THE ONE HAND BY A BARRICADE AT SAINT-MERRY AND ON THE OTHER BY A BARRICADE OF THE RUE MAUBUEE COMMANDED THREE STREETS THE RUE DES ARCIS THE RUE SAINT-MARTIN AND THE RUE AUBRY-LE-BOUCHER WHICH IT FACED

HOCHE AND MARCEAU HAD NO STRAGGLERS

YOUR HAIR IS PERFECTLY WHITE WHITE SAID HE

THERE ARE MOMENTS IN BATTLES IN WHICH THE SOUL HARDENS THE MAN UNTIL THE SOLDIER IS CHANGED INTO A STATUE AND WHEN ALL THIS FLESH TURNS INTO GRANITE
THE CARE WHICH HE HAD HIMSELF TAKEN TO DETACH HER FROM HIM WAS SUCCEEDING
MEN ARE CRUSHED TRAMPLED DOWN OTHERS WALK OVER THE DEAD AND THE LIVING
THEY ARE NO LONGER ANYTHING MORE THAN THE TWO BOUNDARIES OF THE SAME DESTINY
HE SMOKED
INSTANTLY SEVERAL VOICES AROSE
YOU SHALL PICK ME UP ON THE QUAY AS YOU PASS THE DILIGENCE PASSES SEES ME HALTS AND TAKES ME
IF YOU DEIGN TO HONOR ME WITH THE MOST MODEST OFFERING I SHALL IMMEDIATELY OCCUPY MYSELF IN MAKING A PIESSE OF VERSE TO PAY YOU MY TRIBUTE OF GRATITUDE
IN THE PRESENCE OF THE IMMINENCE OF THE PERIL IN THE PRESENCE OF THE DEATH OF M
NOT AN UNEVENNESS OF THE GROUND NOT A CAPRICE IN THE ARCHITECTURE NOT A FOLD

IN SHORT THAT HE WAS IN THE WRONG
AND THEN WE HAVE SO FEW BOURGEOIS IN THE NEIGHBORHOOD
HE HAS CONGREGATIONS TO REPROVE PRIVILEGES TO GRANT A WHOLE ECCLESIASTICAL LIBRARY TO EXAMINE,--PRAYER-BOOKS DIOCESAN CATECHISMS BOOKS OF HOURS ETC.,--CHARGES TO WRITE SERMONS TO AUTHORIZE CURES AND MAYORS TO RECONCILE A CLERICAL CORRESPONDENCE AN ADMINISTRATIVE CORRESPONDENCE
IT IS MADE OF PORCELAIN."--AT THAT MOMENT A BULLET BROKE THE CROSS ON HIS BREAST AND HE FELL

CHAPTER VI--OLD PEOPLE ARE MADE TO GO OUT OPPORTUNELY WHEN EVENING CAME JEAN VALJEAN WENT OUT
THEN A FOURTH
HE HAD THOUGHT OF EVERYTHING EXCEPT THIS--THAT HE SHOULD ONE DAY BE CALLED UPON TO SEE HIS FATHER
THEY DID NOT KNOW OF ITS EXISTENCE
AS A WAIF OR A SOUVENIR
THREE MONTHS HAD ELAPSED
NOTE FOR THE ADMINISTRATION LEFT IT ON THE TABLE AND QUITTED THE POST
IT WAS NOTHING TO EAT HIS CLOTHES AND HIS WATCH
IT IS UNNECESSARY TO SAY THAT PERMISSION IS ALWAYS REFUSED TO MEN

POINT OF DEPARTURE
IT IS JUST THAT SOME RECOMPENSE SHOULD BE BESTOWED ON YOU
HE IDOLIZES ME SO THAT ONE DAY WHEN HE SAW ME MAKING BATTER FOR SOME PANCAKES HE SAID TO ME

I WAS SIXTY YEARS OF AGE WHEN MY COUNTRY CALLED ME AND COMMANDED ME TO CONCERN MYSELF WITH ITS AFFAIRS

THE MAN WOULD PROBABLY BE CONDEMNED

PARDON ME I SAY THAT VERY BADLY
